original_text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and hurtful lusts, which drown men in destruction and perdition.
korean_text: 부하려 하는 자들은 시험과 올무와 여러 가지 어리석고 해로운 욕심에 떨어지나니 곧 사람으로 파멸과 멸망에 빠지게 하는 것이라

sentences.original_text: But they that will be rich
fall into temptation and a snare
and into many foolish and hurtful lusts
which drown men in destruction and perdition
